txt.en: Verity Tyne has lost the glittering copper ring given to her by her husband Barton, and she is beside herself with worry that he will find out.

'Are you a jeweller? Do you know one? I really need the services of a jeweller, for I have lost my wedding ring, and I need a replacement before my husband Barton gets back from the Forsaken Inn!

'I don't know where it's gone, but it must have just slipped off my finger. If you can bring me a glittering copper ring to replace it, I'd pay you for your trouble!

'Don't tell Barton I lost the ring! I can't believe I could be so careless!'
Verity Tyne is in the Crafting Hall in Bree.\n\nVerity Tyne has asked for you to find a jeweller willing to make her a glittering copper ring to replace the wedding ring she lost.

'Thank you so much, [placeholder]! This ring looks exactly like the ring I lost, and Barton will never know the difference!\n\n'Take these coins and other small items, please! You've really helped me out!'
Verity Tyne is in the Crafting Hall in Bree.\n\nVerity Tyne has asked for you to find a jeweller willing to make her an amethyst ring to replace the wedding ring she lost.
'If you can get a jeweller to make me a glittering copper ring to replace my wedding ring, I'd really appreciate it, [placeholder]!'
'Don't tell Barton I lost my wedding ring!'
'Don't tell Barton I lost my wedding ring!'
Bring glittering copper ring to Verity Tyne
Crafting: Verity Tyne Has Lost Her Ring
